headline: MAAG Group Launches PEARLO CS, a Compact Pelletizing Solution
summary: DOWNERS GROVE, Ill., Sept. 4, 2025 /PRNewswire/ – MAAG Group, part of Dover (NYSE: DOV), today announced the launch of the PEARLO Compact System (CS), an innovative underwater pelletizing solution designed for use in small-scale plastics compounding, masterbatch production and processing of virgin polymers.

headline: GNRC Launches PWRmicro Inverter to Boost Solar Output and Integration
summary: Generac introduces PWRmicro microinverter, boosting solar power output, streamlining installs and integrating with its clean energy ecosystem.

headline: Generac Up 39% in Three Months: Where Will the Stock Head From Here?
summary: GNRC stock surged 39% in three months as residential and C&I momentum, plus new product launches, fuel long-term growth potential.
